changes.change: Fixed 99% of all resizing Issues. And as a small christmas present/easter egg, double tap the grabber when you have an app open in the reachability view :)
Icons are now Properly aligned and sized in the App Selector views
Fully Fixed App Selectors. Now Show app labels, updated/beta dots and badges
Fixed Black screen bug. But the bug still happens when running apps inside windows
Now adds Aura and Empoleon from Multiplexer. Black screen still happens with empoleon and the vpn bug are still left to fix
Readded windows themes from Multiplexer and adds optional Activator Gestures
Fixed 9.1 compatibility. Still need to fix black screen bugs
Fixed Black Screen bug with windows on home screem. Fixed Hash sum when downloading. Colored prefs to make them a little prettier
Fixed startup crash due to typo
Fixed not being able to launch apps from HS when running app in window. I say the tweak is pretty stable, but I need more reports to see if all the bugs have been fixed
Fixed crashes caused by a typo and Asphaleia

Fixed THE startup crash, fixed audio issues? Fixed VPN bug, may have fixed 10.X crash but not sure. Unfortunately in order to fix the startup crash, I had to kill ios 8 support (if people used zypen on ios 8 sorry)

Sorry for lack of updates, was busy updating all of Multiplexer for Elijah Frederickson (95% done). Fixed assertiond hook (not sure of implications but should fix backgronding issues) and made the Daemon actually work. Still working on launch crashes

changelog.change: I THINK I FIXED THE STARTUP CRASH!!! That and a better iOS 10 compatibility.
Fixed crash when clicking home button.
